definition: all parties (in a dispute etc)/all sides/all directions

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: But the mood in Copenhagen yesterday did not seem conducive to compromise.
sentences.chinese: 但昨日哥本哈根的氣氛似乎不利於各方達成妥協。

sentences.english: Welcome all customers customized letter to inquire.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎各方客戶來函來電諮詢定製。

sentences.english: None of these changes will happen smoothly or easily.
sentences.chinese: 這些變化需要各方的共同奮鬥，不可能一帆風順。

sentences.english: What's the View of Every Party about the Second Forum of Textile and Clothing Technology?
sentences.chinese: 第二屆新疆紡織服裝技術論壇舉辦，各方怎麼看？

sentences.english: In communicating the level of alarm, authorities need to be able to move down as well as up.
sentences.chinese: 在通報警戒級別時，各方當局需能做出上下調整。

sentences.english: Parties concerned should continue to support the work of UNMIK.
sentences.chinese: 有關各方應繼續支持聯科特派團開展工作。

sentences.english: What insurance are the parties required to maintain?
sentences.chinese: 當事各方需要買的保險有哪些？

sentences.english: China has been dedicated to promoting dialogue and negotiation, and has actively engaged with relevant parties to promote non-proliferation.
sentences.chinese: 中國一直致力於勸和促談，積極做有關各方工作。

sentences.english: This Agreement is made in duplicate, one original for each party hereto.
sentences.chinese: 本協議一式二份，各方圴持有一份正本。

sentences.english: We will continue to stay in communication with all parties including Cambodia and Thailand over relevant issue.
sentences.chinese: 我們將就有關問題繼續與柬泰等各方保持溝通。

sentences.english: China hopes all other parties do more to encourage and facilitate talks for peace.
sentences.chinese: 中方希望其他各方也多做勸和促談工作。

sentences.english: The positions of the parties are not the same on these substantive issues.
sentences.chinese: 各方在這些實質問題上的立場並不一致。

sentences.english: The result is a global standoff.
After that initial meeting, try to meet with each of them at least monthly.
sentences.chinese: 在初始會談之後，儘量至少每月與各方會談一次。

sentences.english: Revise the goals until all parties agree on them and understand them.
sentences.chinese: 修訂目標，直到各方理解他們，並對此達成一致意見。

sentences.english: All parties have done their jobs conducive to peace and talks. And what did China do?
sentences.chinese: 各方都進行了勸和和促談工作，中方作了那些努力？

definition: all walks of life/all social circles
both sides (in contract)/the two opposing sides (in a dispute)
to consult/to discuss seriously/to negotiate/to confer/negotiations/consultations
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to declare one's position/to say where one stands
to join forces/to give full cooperation
